data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

data.fullContent: In advance of Thursday's lecture, please install the required software on your machine. If you have difficulties during installation, bring your computer to us on Wednesday. We can help you pinpoint the source of the issue prior to the start of the tutorial. This will allow us to hit the ground running at 10 AM, without squandering time on troubleshooting issues.
data.answer: 在周四的讲座之前，请在你的机器上安装所需的软件。如果你在安装过程中遇到困难，星期三把你的电脑带到我们这里来。我们可以在教程开始之前帮助您确定问题的根源。这将使我们能够在上午10点就开始工作，而不会把时间浪费在故障排除上。
